name: UTruePay
tag_list: payment, transfer, money-transfer, paypal-alternative, international-payments, tranfer, pay, money, merchant, credit-card, credit-card-alternative, bill
overview: UTruePay is an E-commerce payment business based in London, UK . It allows buyers and suppliers to make and receive payments without credit cards, whilst still providing buyers with the consumer protection benefits that credit cards promise to offer. In doing so, it simultaneously protects legitimate suppliers from fraudulent transactions. UTruePay says it is useful in any circumstances where a buyer of a good requires protection from supplier default, and does not want to, or is unable to pay by credit card. Such circumstances: A supplier is reluctant to accept a credit card as the fees paid may be prohibitively expensive for him/her. A supplier may be unwilling to accept a credit card for fear of being the victim of credit card fraud. A buyer may be looking to negotiate an improvement in price by not purchasing with a credit card. A buyer does not want to submit credit card details to a third party. UTruePay currently provides itâ€™s service to companies and individuals making payments INTO registered companies and partnerships within the UK. The service is in the process of being launched in the United States and Europe where companies in these regions can also be paid.
